sentence.Network_en: He was already beginning to display quiet symptoms of heterodoxy.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时,他已开始暗暗流露出叛离正统的迹象.

sentence.Network_en: He showd a taste and talent also for danger and extremism, for heterodoxy, for ordeals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对威胁凶险、极端主义, 对异端邪说, 对酷刑苛判也表现出极大的兴趣和才华.

sentence.Network_en: Despite his heterodoxy, faults, and weaknesses, he was a man with a conscience.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然克莱不顾世俗, 有许多缺点, 许多毛病, 但是他却是个有良心的人.
